CONFIRM_DELETE_SUCCESS_MSG: Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
CONFIRM_DETELE_FAIL_MSG: This recording has not been uploaded yet. Are you sure you want to delete it?
PERMISSION_CHECK_ERROR_MSG: An error occurred while checking Do Not Disturb permissions. Please try again later.
MODAL_DESCRIPTION: Recording might be disturbed by calls and notifications. For better performance, please enable Do Not Disturb mode.
PERMISSION_ERROR: Could not enable Do Not Disturb mode. Please check your device settings.
UPLOAD_EVIDENCE_RECORDING: Make sure you have a stable internet connectivity for the upload action. Would you like to proceed?
LOCATION_PERMISSION_REQUIRED: Location permission is required to proceed.
LOCATION_SERVICES_NOT_ENABLED_MSG: Please enable location services and try again.
LOCATION_PERMISSION_MSG: We need access to your location to proceed.
PERMISSION_REQUIRED_MSG: Please grant the required permissions to use this feature.
